name: Robo Rally Remake
description:
The unofficial remake of the classic board game, Robo Rally. Program your robots, charge up and upgrade them to sabotage others in a race through the factory! With global multiplayer and automatic setup, this is the easiest way to play with your friends.

Music Credits
All songs are licensed under CC BY 4.0
"The Black Kitty" by Rolemusic
"Mission" by BoxCat Games
"Against the Wall" by BoxCat Games
"B-3" by BoxCat Games
"Mt Fox Shop" by BoxCat Games
"Inspiration" by BoxCat Games
"Passing Time" by BoxCat Games
